findings.message:
MultiOwnable (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#48-131) contract sets array length with a user-controlled value:
	- owners.push(msg.sender) (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#62)
findings.name: controlled-array-length

findings.message:
Reentrancy in BrokerInt.reward(address,uint256) (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#168-171):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(brokerImp.reward(_beneficiary,_value)) (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#169)
	Event emitted after the call(s):
	- Reward(_beneficiary,_value) (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#170)
findings.name: reentrancy-events

findings.message:
Version constraint ^0.4.21 contains known severe issues (https://solidity.readthedocs.io/en/latest/bugs.html)
	- DirtyBytesArrayToStorage
	- ABIDecodeTwoDimensionalArrayMemory
	- KeccakCaching
	- EmptyByteArrayCopy
	- DynamicArrayCleanup
	- ImplicitConstructorCallvalueCheck
	- TupleAssignmentMultiStackSlotComponents
	- MemoryArrayCreationOverflow
	- privateCanBeOverridden
	- SignedArrayStorageCopy
	- ABIEncoderV2StorageArrayWithMultiSlotElement
	- DynamicConstructorArgumentsClippedABIV2
	- UninitializedFunctionPointerInConstructor_0.4.x
	- IncorrectEventSignatureInLibraries_0.4.x
	- ABIEncoderV2PackedStorage_0.4.x
	- ExpExponentCleanup
	- EventStructWrongData
	- NestedArrayFunctionCallDecoder.
It is used by:
	- ^0.4.21 (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#1)
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: solc-0.4.26 is an outdated solc version. Use a more recent version (at least 0.8.0), if possible.
findings.name: solc-version

findings.message: Parameter BrokerInt.reward(address,uint256)._value (0x0a9a88059c8d54af3d466020af987e98d4024219.sol#168) is not in mixedCase
findings.name: naming-convention
